metadata.name: ManageEngine Endpoint Central Dctask64.EXE Potential Abuse
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of "dctask64.exe", a signed binary by ZOHO Corporation part of ManageEngine Endpoint Central. This binary can be abused for DLL injection, arbitrary command and process execution.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\dctask64.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('6834b1b94e49701d77ccb3c0895e1afd')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('1bb6f93b129f398c7c4a76bb97450bba')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('faa2ac19875fade461c8d89dcf2710a3')) OR contains(lower(process.file.hashes.value), lower('f1039ced4b91572ab7847d26032e6bbf'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' executecmd64 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' invokeexe ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' injectdll '))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of "dctask64.exe", a signed binary by ZOHO Corporation part of ManageEngine Endpoint Central. This binary can be abused for DLL injection, arbitrary command and process execution.
